column4: I have installed apache with php with the help of the unofficial guide.. but when I try to open the info.php firefox wants to open it with gedit.. any clues anyone??
: sounds like PHP is not installed on the apache server
but it is.. at least it looks like it.. I have a php.ini in /etc/php4/apache2/
cgid.conf  cgid.load  cgi.load  userdir.conf  userdir.load are the only ones it mods-enabled
isn't this supposed to be done automatically?
nope.. crap.. I got it to work before I reinstalled.. without doing anything special
: hmm, maybe im wrong. but it's not on my home server, either.
: maybe you need to install libapache2-mod-php4?
: yeah, doing that on my home system got php4 for me
you need to 'apt-get install libapache2-mod-php4' and then '/etc/init.d/apache2 restart'
: once you install libapache2-mod-php4, you'll see the php entries in /etc/apache2/mods-enabled
ok.. will try that.. tried to restart but it didn't do the trick..
got it working.. ubuntu spirit glows!!
